contribution_desc:
Dynamic lighting in virtual worlds. Although, this paper doesn't focus on cross-device interaction per se, it presents an interesting interaction where virtual characters move from a PC screen to a tablet when brought nearby.

"When the user holds the tablet near the desktop station, a humanoid character walks towards the screen and jumps to the tablet. IrDA is used to detected proximity; when the tablet is in close proximity to a desktop, the virtual character transfers from one system to another"
interaction_techniques: Data transfer/sharing; transfer of virtual character
